channel.title: Gunay Orbay, PHD
channel.description: Recent content on Gunay Orbay, PHD

item.title: Welcome Hugo
item.description: After randomly learning about Hugo, the static webpage creator, I immediately wanted to give it a try as it resembled Jekyll quite a bit. To my surprise, I find Hugo to be much much easier to install in contrast to wrestling with ruby and gems. The difference is quite stark in the time that I spent to get the first page up and running. The list of positives for me is quite short for now but I’m sure I’ll have more than enough opinions about Hugo the more I use it.

item.title: List of publications
item.description: I am finally bringing back the list of publications, including abstracts, copy-paste bibtex citations, and more. I intend to add more content besides just published work.

item.title: First post
item.description: Hello everyone! This is my most recent attempt to perpare an easy-to-manage web space for myself. After fruitless attempts with Wordpress, intermittent mysql problems, AWS EC2 setup difficulties, I am giving jekyll a try. It seems very straigtforward and easy IF you can manage to upgrade ruby to an acceptable version. My experience hasn’t been as smooth as advertised on a Macbook. Welp! Till next time. - G
